label: A5B2_oP14_31_a2b_b-001
title: Shcherbinaite ($D8_{7}$, V$_{2}$O$_{5}$) Structure ({\em Obsolete})
comments: This structure was reinvestigated by (Enjalbert, 1986) and others because of ``[dissatisfaction with] some aspects of the crystal structure.'' They proposed a \href{current_web_home_dir/A5B2_oP14_59_a2e_e-001}{revised structure in space group $Pmmn$ \#59}. We list this structure here for the historical record.
